snippet: The Nets' Kris Humphries has defied logic by becoming the most disliked player in the N.B.A.
abstract: The Nets' Kris Humphries has defied logic by becoming the most disliked player in the N.B.A.
lead_paragraph: 3:38 p.m. | Updated As much as the Knicks' early season struggles have put fans into fits of hand-wringing, at least one can take solace in the fact that one of the most disliked players in the league doesn't suit up for New York. He's so unpopular that he's being soundly booed in arenas across the country if he dare sets foot on the court. In Toronto the other night, fans mocked him by waving large posters.
